description: Web Resource Activity events describe actions executed on a Web Resource.
caption: Web Resource Activity
name: web_resource_activity

1.caption: Create
1.description: One or more web resources were created.

2.caption: Read
2.description: One or more web resources were read / viewed.

3.caption: Update
3.description: One or more web resources were updated.

4.caption: Delete
4.description: One or more web resources were deleted.

5.caption: Search
5.description: A search was performed on a web resource.

6.caption: Import
6.description: A web resource import was performed into an Application.

7.caption: Export
7.description: A web resource export was performed from an Application.

8.caption: Share
8.description: One or more web resources were shared.

dst_endpoint.description: Details about server providing the web resources.

http_request.description: Details about the underlying http request.

web_resources.description: Details about web resources that were affected by the activity/event.

web_resources_result.description: Details on the web resources resulting from the activity.
